attributes.description: The name of the human: director, screenwriter, cast member, etc.
The city where the movie was filmed or the city in which the film takes place
The country where the movie was filmed or the country in which the film takes place
examples: The story takes place in Clairton, Pennsylvania,

attributes.description: The name of the film production company

examples: The film won the National Film Award for Best Feature Film
National Film Award for Best Feature Film

attributes.description: The written work on which the film is based
examples: Adventures of Nils Holgersson is based on the novel The Wonderful Adventures of Nils

attributes.description: The name of the film character
examples: the first creation of the character Mickey Mouse
Welcome to Eltingville was written by Dorkin and Chuck Sheetz and received a positive reception.
Mobile Suit Gundam F91 was Gundam creator Yoshiyuki Tomino's attempt to launch a new Gundam saga, set 30 years after Char's Counterattack and 27 years after the later published Gundam Unicorn.
